word: The plan to bring Elder Franke into New York now, when there are plenty of other places in which he can labor, is a mistake. God desires the work to be established in New York after His order. There are some who are deeply convicted and nothing should be allowed to break up the interest.--Letter 149, 1901, pp. 1, 2. (To Elder J. E. Jayne, October 25, 1901.)
